bug.author: kparichay
bug.summary: Tensor filter updates properties with empty string
bug.description: Tensor filter set property updates its properties with empty string. Single API passes the properties given by the user directly to the tensor_filter_common (after stringify). In case, for example, if the names aren't set, empty name is given to the property. gst_tesnor_filter_set_property() does not update the internal properties with empty properties. However, it does update the number of tensors (to 0 in the above example).

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/2594>#2594</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
